titleStmt.title: The Tryals of Peter Boss, George Keith, Thomas Budd, and William Bradford, Quakers for several great misdemeanors (as was pretended by their adversaries) before a court of Quakers at the sessions held at Philadelphia in Pensylvania, the ninth, tenth, and twelfth days of December, 1692 : giving also an account of the most arbitrary procedure of that court.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
Boss, Peter.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
